column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The menu looked very nice and a good amount of ramen was offered! The spice levels were I believe milk
column5: and Inferno 2. The inferno spice levels I believe weren't shown in the menu
column6: you had to ask. The server was very sweet and she knew a lot about the menu when I had questions. Always attentive and wanted to make sure our first time was great.
